title: 1208Shutdown Deal Will Allow Senators to Sue Over “Arctic Frost” Probe(thelibertydaily.com)posted1 d

1208 Shutdown Deal Will Allow Senators to Sue Over “Arctic Frost” Probe (thelibertydaily.com) posted 1 day ago by Sea_Still 55 comments award share report block Shutdown Deal Will Allow Senators to Sue Over "Arctic Frost" Probe - 🔔 The Liberty Daily If you love the news, check out The Liberty Daily's homepage. (DCNF)—GOP lawmakers secured a provision in the shutdown deal taking aim at the Biden FBI’s “Arctic Frost” surveillance campaign into a vast swath of Republicans and conservative entities. The m... thelibertydaily.com
